Nostalgic look at scary moments (in Boob McNutt, Dick Tracy, The Gumps) and dramatic moments (in Flash Gordon and For Better or For Worse), with mentions of Toots and Casper, Rugrats, Baby Blues, Zits, and Rose is Rose.
